sqlMap.select: SELECT ITEMID as itemid, OAS_ITEMID as oasItemid, ITEM_TEXT as itemText, ITEM_INDEX as itemIndex, ITEM_TYPE as itemType, CORRECT_RESPONSE as correctResponse, POINTS_POSSIBLE as pointsPossible, SEC_OBJID as secObjid, assessmentid as assessmentid FROM ITEM_DIM WHERE OAS_ITEMID = #oasItemid:VARCHAR# AND SEC_OBJID = #secObjid:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM_DIM ( ITEM_INDEX, ITEM_TEXT, ITEM_TYPE, CORRECT_RESPONSE, OAS_ITEMID, POINTS_POSSIBLE, SEC_OBJID, assessmentid ) VALUES ( #itemIndex:NUMERIC#, #itemText:VARCHAR#, #itemType:VARCHAR#, #correctResponse:VARCHAR#, #oasItemid:VARCHAR#, #pointsPossible:NUMERIC#, #secObjid:NUMERIC#, #assessmentid:NUMERIC# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ITEM_DIM SET ITEM_TEXT = #itemText:VARCHAR#, ITEM_INDEX = #itemIndex:NUMERIC#, ITEM_TYPE = #itemType:VARCHAR#, CORRECT_RESPONSE = #correctResponse:VARCHAR#, POINTS_POSSIBLE = #pointsPossible:NUMERIC#, SEC_OBJID = #secObjid:NUMERIC#, assessmentid = #assessmentid:NUMERIC# WHERE ITEMID = #itemid:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT OAS_ITEMID || SEC_OBJID || ASSESSMENTID as key, ITEMID as itemid, OAS_ITEMID as oasItemid, ITEM_TEXT as itemText, ITEM_INDEX as itemIndex, ITEM_TYPE as itemType, CORRECT_RESPONSE as correctResponse, POINTS_POSSIBLE as pointsPossible, SEC_OBJID as secObjid, ASSESSMENTID as assessmentid FROM ITEM_DIM WHERE (OAS_ITEMID, SEC_OBJID) IN
( #items[].oasItemid:VARCHAR#, #items[].secObjid:NUMERIC# )
